case.title: amiga latina con los pies bonitos - 40 (Queens)
case.text: single white latino male 40's very slim build no kids i am a down to earth open minding seeking chubby or slim latina female friend pretty feet & toes age 30yrs old & up to hang out from time to time i will treat you to movies dinners plus $$ to pamper your feet for hours i am looking for ltr friendship pic 4 pic.
